original: 會稽山陰人，東吳將領。鍾離乃複姓。有長者之風，威恩部伍，智勇分明。善於應對山越、五谿等南夷，數度奉命安撫平定諸夷。
text: Kuaiji Shanyin people, Soochow generals. Zhong Li is Fu's surname. There is the wind of the elders, the wise and courageous. Be good at dealing with Shanyue, Wuxi and other Nanyis, and have been ordered to appease and pacify them.
